paragraph: Megumi Seki (関 めぐみ, Seki Megumi) (born 8 September 1985 in Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan) is a Japanese actress. Her movies include Koi wa Go-Shichi-Go! (2005), Negative Happy Chainsaw Edge (2008) and Dragonball Evolution (2009).
Seishun Energy Mo Hitotsu no Sugar & Spice (Fuji TV, 2006)
Suteki na Yoru, Boku ni Kudasai (2007)
